meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>blade</kanji>'s <kanji>ahead</kanji> is the farthest part of the blade away from you (since it's ahead of you). This is the <vocabulary>edge of the blade</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>blade edge</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi readings of the kanji. For 刃 you learned that with the kanji. For 先 that's the vocab version of the kanji.
